backend/main.mo: Backend canister defining authorization mixin, user profiles, and extensive resident-related types with health check and profile management functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two release-related features, associated files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of autogenerated summaries describing various frontend components, pages, hooks, and styling files.
frontend/docs/release/promote-v22-to-pro: Documentation for promoting Draft Version 22 to Production, including checklists, steps, rollback plan, and verification items.
frontend/docs/release/promote-v27-to-pro: Documentation for promoting Draft Version 27 to Production under the name 'Moritz Care Home', detailing process, checklists, and rollback steps.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables, dark theme overrides, and base element styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file setting favicon links, page title, and root element for loading the frontend app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root app component managing authentication, actor initialization, profile loading, and boot error handling using a state machine and router.
frontend/src/components/adl/ADLTab.tsx: Displays a resident's ADL records in a table with an option to add new records if permitted.
frontend/src/components/adl/modals/AddAD: Modal form allowing users to create a new ADL record with required fields and submit via mutation.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Simple UI screen informing the user they lack permissions and providing a button to return home.
frontend/src/components/auth/BootErrorSc: Shows detailed diagnostics and retry/logout controls when bootstrapping the app fails during actor or profile initialization.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new users to enter name, role, and optional related resident IDs before saving their profile.
frontend/src/components/branding/Logo.ts: Renders the Moritz Care Home logo with different size variants.
App layout handling login/logout logic and rendering the main UI structure including header, footer, and content.
frontend/src/components/mar/MARTab.tsx: Displays a resident's MAR records in a table and provides a modal to add new records when permitted.
frontend/src/components/mar/modals/AddMA: Modal form for creating a new MAR record, validating fields, and submitting via mutation.
frontend/src/components/medications/Medi: Renders active and discontinued medications with editing and status-change controls, grouped into sections.
Shows a resident's medications with edit/discontinue options and modals for adding or editing entries.
frontend/src/components/medications/moda: Modal form for adding a new medication with dosage, route, times, physician, and notes.
Modal form for editing an existing medication, allowing updates to all fields before submitting.
frontend/src/components/residents/CodeSt: Renders a badge indicating whether a resident is Full Code or DNR.
frontend/src/components/residents/modals: Modal form for creating a new resident with fields for personal data, contacts, medications, physicians, and insurance.
Modal for editing an existing resident’s personal details, physicians, and pharmacy information.
frontend/src/components/residents/Reside: Print-only resident profile report component displaying personal info, physicians, medications, and facility details.
frontend/src/components/vitals/DailyVita: Tab displaying a resident’s recorded daily vitals and providing a button to add new entries.
frontend/src/components/vitals/modals/Re: Modal form for recording daily vital signs including blood pressure, temperature, and other measurements.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook to create and manage an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity state and login/logout helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend calls with React Query, handling user profiles, residents, and permissions while integrating actor and identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useResilientActor.ts: Creates and caches a resilient backend actor tied to the user’s identity and retries initialization with optional admin token support.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, a healthcare-themed OKLCH color palette, dark mode variables, utilities, and print-specific styling.
frontend/src/lib/auth/helpers.ts: Implements authorization helpers determining access rights and labels based on user type and admin status.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/ResidentDashboardPage: Displays a resident dashboard with filters, search, sorting, stats, and a modal for adding new residents using hooks and UI components.
frontend/src/pages/ResidentProfilePage.t: Main resident profile page component handling data loading, permissions, and modals for editing information, medications, MAR/ADL records, and vitals.
frontend/src/utils/dateOnly.ts: Utility functions for parsing YYYY-MM-DD dates and calculating timezone-safe ages.
frontend/src/utils/errorDiagnostics.ts: Normalizes unknown errors into structured diagnostics and formats them for display or debugging.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hashes, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme colors, animations, plugins, and container settings.
project_state.json: JSON metadata describing project state, release info, existing features, and new feature requests.
